question:
You and your friends ate a meal at a restaurant to celebrate a special occasion, and you were very pleased with the food and service.

Write a letter to the restaurant manager. In your letter:

Give details of your visit to the restaurant
Explain the reason for the celebration
Say what you liked about the food or service
Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am writing this missive to express my feelings related to the visit that I recently had to your Restaurant.We went there on 24th March 2022 to have lunch at around 2:00 pm.We were a total of twenty members besides this it was a sunny day.

I would like to explain the scenario,it was my friend's birthday party.He turned 24 and for ,that he booked your upper house hall.We have inquired a lot of party places however everyone recommended your Restaurant and we also felt a worth investing in a party at your place.

First of all, the food was not just tempting instead it was very delicious.Apart from this,the staff was very friendly,the chef himself inquired about the food he prepared.The service was very fast.They were serving hot and sizzling food after a gap of five to ten minutes.As we had done buffet system,furthermore,the variety was far beyond our expectations.
I hope you maintain the same quality and service in the future.
